document.full_text: the dollar sank to a 16-month low against a basket of currencies on thursday as investors bet u.s. monetary policy would continue to be loose, while a report that chinese inflation will rise dragged on equities.
document.title: dollar at low, world stocks weaker
lines_and_colors: the dollar sank to a 16-month low against a basket of currencies on thursday as investors bet u.s. monetary policy would continue to be loose, while a report that chinese inflation will rise dragged on equities.
